name: Avoid using NSMutableString appendFormat: on behalf of NSURL instance
description:
An attacker can tamper with the URL and point it to an unintended server. Sensitive information may then be transmitted to the attacker's server.
The injection could be done in NSMutableString using the methods
appendFormat:
and used when instanciating through NSURL URLWithString.
This rule is compliant with CISQ OMG ASCSM-CWE-079 recommendation and with OWASP 2014-M7 recommendation
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: An attacker could access other user information thanks to string injection threw the addFormat method. This is why it is highly recommended to avoid the usage of the API.
